body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Edward Turner. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi there, my name is Megan Jackson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Megan. Could you please confirm your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you so much for sharing that information with me, Megan. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit confused about the shipping process, could you please explain it to me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, I'll explain everything about our shipping process in detail. Thank you for reaching out, Megan. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. Have a great day, Megan. Goodbye.
